description: London Borough of Ealing consultation for Engineering works comprising remediation works at the former Gas Works site (Retained Land) at Former Southall Gasworks , The Straight, Southall, UB1 1QX.
decision_conditions: This out of borough notification has been submitted so officers may issue comments on behalf of the London Borough of Hillingdon (LBH) to the London Borough of Ealing for the approval of remediation works to the area to be retained within the southern section of the former gas works site for gas transmission. It is intended that these remediation works address those pollutant linkages to enable the continued use of the site for gas transmission for the foreseeable future.
The wider site has been subject to a number of applications the main of which is an outline application for the redevelopment of the former gas works site for a residential led mixed use scheme.

There is no planned re-development of the site which will be retained as an operational gas transmission site, owned and occupied by CGL for the foreseeable future.  This application forms the second phase of remediation works proposed to be undertaken on site.
A first phase of remediation has been completed at this sit

The London Borough of Hillingdon (LBH) require a written method statement providing details of the proposed remediation scheme, indicating how and when completion of remedial works will be achieved and verified. The remediation scheme must include details of a suitable odour management plan (OMP), incorporating an acceptable methodology for preventing or where that is not practicable to minimise the risks of pollution from odour/s emitting from the proposed works and migrating beyond the Local Authority Boundary between The London Boroughs of Hillingdon (LBH) and Ealing. The OMP, along with details of a watching brief / odour discovery plan to identify, report and address any fugitive odours at the boundary shall be agreed in writing with LBH prior to commencement of works, No deviation shall be made from the OMP without the express agreement of LBH prior to its implementation.
